OPERATOR.NO_TRANSLATION: 尚未完成翻譯，請參閱英文版文件

HOME.TITLE: Reactive Extensions Library for JavaScript
HOME.DESCRIPTION: RxJS is a library for reactive programming using Observables, to make it easier to compose asynchronous or callback-based code. This project is a rewrite of Reactive-Extensions/RxJS with better performance, better modularity, better debuggable call stacks, while staying mostly backwards compatible, with some breaking changes that reduce the API surface

INSTALL.TITLE: 安裝
INSTALL.DESCRIPTION: 更多資訊關於如何從npm 到 CDN安裝 RxJS

LEARN.TITLE: 學習
LEARN.DESCRIPTION: 閱讀關於 Observables, Observer, Subject 等完整文件。更多的內容，包含範例程式碼、圖表說明來幫助你更了解整體的運作方式

INSTALLATION.TITLE: 安裝指南
INSTALLATION.INTRO: 下面是各種安裝 RxJs 的方式
INSTALLATION.PATCHING: To import only what you need by patching (this is useful for size-sensitive bundling)
INSTALLATION.WITHBIND: To import what you need and use it with proposed bind operator:
INSTALLATION.NOTE: Note: This additional syntax requires transpiler support and this syntax may be completely withdrawn from TC39 without notice! Use at your own risk.
INSTALLATION.ERROR: 當使用 RxJS 時，如果你收到錯誤訊息如 error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Promise' or error TS2304: Cannot find name 'Iterable' 你需要安裝補充的型別定義檔
INSTALLATION.NOTINTERFACE: 如果你沒有使用型別，介面可以從 /es6-shim/es6-shim.d.ts. 複製
INSTALLATION.ADDTYPE: 加入型別定義檔案至 tsconfig.json 或是 CLI 參數
INSTALLATION.VIAV3: 透過 npm 3 安裝套件時，可使用下列命令
INSTALLATION.VIAV2: 如果在套件標示成穩定版前使用 npm 2.x 安裝時，你需要給予特定版號

FORCDN.PART2: 只要將下列連結中的 version 替換成目前版號

INSTALLATION.FORBETA12: 針對 RxJS 5.0.0-beta.12 或更高版本
